content:
Then, Mobai and Glenn,
are both members of Loomi Co.

The construction of the new Astralink wave
was spearheaded by Loomi Co. and the Migration Association,
with support from Revelare Academia and Parade Station.

The Coordinator of Loomi Co. is in charge of living facilities,
while the Coordinator of the Qianfeng Association handles security and external exploration.
What the... Don't tell me I'm the only one here from the Qianfeng Association!

How about thatâ€”!
Aren't I amazing!
I memorized all of Mobai's lengthy explanations!

Mors is from that, um, curtain Academia...
Huh? ...Not curtain?

That's not important - what matters is that
Frostia is also from the Academia!

Once things settle down,
scholars from Revelare Academia will come to provide support,
and Parade Station's broadcasts will keep you informed daily.
